text: is a Japanese footballer. He is a defender. He was educated at and played for Kansai University before moving to Singapore.http://www.albirex.com.sg/en/archives/9126/ He signed for Albirex Niigata FC (Singapore) from the S.League in 2014 and played for 3 years with the team.
